Performances > September 1977: The Two Butterflies

– Click image to view.

September 1977: The Two Butterflies

Plays:

The Two Butterflies (双蝶々曲輪日記)

Scenes:

The Sumo Arena at Horie (堀江相撲場)

The Rice Shop at Daihojimachi (大宝寺町米屋)

The Fighting at Nambaura (難波裏喧嘩)

The Town of Hashimoto (橋本)

The Skylight (八幡里引窓)

Characters:

Chogoro Nuregami (濡髪長五郎)

Tea stall proprietor (茶店亭主)

Chokichi Hanaregoma (放駒長吉)

Oseki (姉お関)

Geta-no-Ichi (下駄の市)

Node-no-San (野手の三)

Rokubei (同行六兵衛)

Myorin (尼妙林)

Gonzaemon Hiraoka (平岡郷左衛門)

Ariemon Mihara (三原有右衛門)

Yogoro Yamazaki (山崎与五郎)

Azuma (藤屋吾妻)

Oteru (嫁お照)

Oyoshi (下女およし)

Jimbei (駕籠舁甚兵衛)

Tasuke (駕籠舁太助)

Jibuemon Hashimoto (橋本治部右衛門)

Yojibei Yamazaki (山崎与次兵衛)

Shohachi, a senior employee (手代庄八)

Junior employee (丁稚)

Ohaya (女房お早)

Chogoro's mother (長五郎母(十次兵衛母))

Jujibei Nampo (南方十次兵衛)

Tampei Hiraoka (平岡丹平)

Denzo Mihara (三原伝蔵)

Buddhist devotee (同行衆)
